nodes.text: The luggerwahl was a species of four-legged creatures that were used as beasts of burden by scavengers during the era of the Galactic War and the Eternal Empire.

The luggerwahl was first added to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as part of the Manipulator Alliance Pack on October 4, 2016. It is meant as a Legends version of the luggabeast, a similar creature that was used by the scavenger Teedo in the movie Star Wars: Episode VII The Force Awakens.
